website_summaries.verdict: This is a classic tie that is made of quality material that proves to be a wardrobe staple for a long time to come.
pros: Backed by a reputable fashion brand, this 3-inch wide tie is available in several elegant colors that pair nicely with differently-colored shirts and suits
Conveniently available in regular and extra-long length
Made of 100% silk and has a gingham texture

customer_reviews.title: Great Fabric Colors and Contemporary Width
customer_reviews.text: I own two Burgundy, one Sky Blue and Two Navy which show if you look up "Calvin Klein Men's Navy Ties" . It's a nice feeling sit yet relatively robust. This is one of my "go to: ties as it goes with everything and the dolors are just right- Especially Burgundy and Navy. Where a plaid, stripe or Gingham Check shirt and this tie looks superb. Not out of place with anything and doesn't look or feel like the vet affordable tie it is. Can't go Wong with this one. I would stick to the basics on color. Just another opinion. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Another Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a wardrobe essential
customer_reviews.text: Burgundy is a classic, powerful business color and great for interviews. Every guy should own a tie like this for basic use, and after scrolling through a couple of pages of ties on a burgundy tie search, I chose this one for the shade and price. I wasn't disappointed! I'm a big fan of the deep, slightly darker than some others color.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Understated and elegant.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I decided to spend a little more to get a name brand (and avoid all the cheap stuff here on Amazon), and it was well worth it. The burgundy is deep and rich, not too flashy. Went great with my dark grey suit and white dress shirt. Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase, and I'll definitely consider other Calvin Klein ties in the future!
customer_reviews.author: churry

customer_reviews.title: It's a tie. It ties. Then hangs down your chest.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a neck tie. You tie it around your neck and then hangs down your chest to an appropriate length of conclusion. If this is what you are looking for I would recommend this product. If you are looking for something else, I would not recommend this product. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: A good tie.
customer_reviews.text: Do I really need to review a tie? It’s a tie. It’s a good tie.
customer_reviews.author: Keigen Rea

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great material!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these ties for my wedding and am very happy with them all around. Great material, simple pattern that will work on any occasion, and smokin' price when compared to the same tie at Men's Wearhouse or Jos A Bank.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anchustegui

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Tie!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tie for my husband and it looked great. It was a little wider than I expected but still looked modern.
customer_reviews.author: kkief

customer_reviews.title: Calvin Klein Dreamy Fall Color
customer_reviews.text: Saved the day! Imagine a few days before your dad is supposed to walk you down the aisle & momma put a pink tie on him for a fall wedding. I knew I could count on Calvin Klein and the color was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Smell awful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and both Ties came and smell terrible. Have a burnt smell to them that I cannot get out. Tried baking soda, eventually gave up and washed them. They still smell terrible. I think they must be knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Slightly short
customer_reviews.text: Nice material. Just a tad short for me. Only 5’11
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good purple tie. Needed it to complete a total badass costume where I dressed as myself.
customer_reviews.author: nagahide13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality at a great price. I love the texture. Probably won't be buying in store anymore. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Idle

customer_reviews.title: Great tie but too thin
customer_reviews.text: beautiful tie. Great quality. A little too thin for my liking. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Shimon

customer_reviews.title: Quality Tie
customer_reviews.text: Wore this tie on my wedding day. Certainly did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: The tie looks good, is a "normal" length, and ties easily. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Matched a Calvin Klein plaid dress shirt perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: cait1209

customer_reviews.title: I like Clavin Klein's ties
customer_reviews.text: I like Clavin Klein's ties. I have a small collection of them and I like this one with subtle color
customer_reviews.author: Don
